net.lightstone
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  net.lightstone.Server

public final class Server
extends Object

The core class of the Lightstone server.

Author:
Graham Edgecombe

Field Summary
private  ServerBootstrap bootstrap
          The ServerBootstrap used to initialize Netty.
private  ExecutorService executor
          The network executor service - Netty dispatches events to this thread pool.
private  ChannelGroup group
          A group containing all of the channels.
private static Logger logger
          The logger for this class.
private  TaskScheduler scheduler
          The task scheduler used by this server.
private  SessionRegistry sessions
          A list of all the active Sessions.
private  World world
          The world this server is managing.
